CustomField.formula: IF( Days_Since_Last_Activity__c <180, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif","Less than 90 Days",40,40) , IF( Days_Since_Last_Activity__c <365, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif","90 to 365 Days",40,40), IF( Days_Since_Last_Activity__c >365, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif","More than a Year",40,40) , IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif","More than 60 Days",40,40))))
CustomField.label: Activity Monitor
